title: We Played Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster!
description:
From this episode of KFGD: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DQxh7vbKxWU&t=776s

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------

transcript_chunks.text: I'm very much into what I played I'm having a great time I'm excited to play more of it as a Dead Rising fan I see the things that I I didn't like as a kid and I'm like ah man like why does the uh the lawn mower control like this like why does this character not follow me the right way uh but the quality of life like the actual UI elements are really great like they added the ability to see like the durability of a weapon which is awesome there's a lot of little things like that that add on to it uh so it's it's it is the definitive version of this game and I'm happy that this exists if you're looking for like a modern like hey this is what Dead Rising could be in 2024 with all of its bells and whistles you're not necessarily going to get that
